Moussa "Bolokada" Conde bụ onye na-akụ ọkpọ si Kissidougou, na obodo Guinea, ọkachamara na Malinke ma ọ bụ Mandinka rhythms, na otu n'ime ndị djembefolas kachasị n'ụwa

Ọ sonyeere Les Percussions de Guinée iji dochie Noumoudy Keïta a ma ama dị ka onye na-akụ ọkpọ ha.  Ọ gara ma rụọ ọrụ n'ebe ndị dị mkpa n'ụwa niile kemgbe 1996 ma gosipụta ya na ihe nkiri IMAX PULSE: Stomp Odyssey
Kemgbe afọ 2004, ọ na-eme ihe nkiri ma na-akụzi ihe na United States
Ọ na-eduzi ụlọ ọrụ ịkụ ọkpọ n'ọtụtụ obodo na mpaghara US na Europe
O weputara CD egwu abụọ, Morowaya na Sankaran
Ọ na-eme ihe nkiri na DVD M'bemba Fakoli: A Musical Journey Through Guinea ma wepụta DVD nkuzi djembe M'bara
Ọ bụ isiokwu nke ihe ngosi na-abịanụ, Bolokada CondeʹMalinke Village Djembefola
E nyere ya ọnọdụ onye mbịara mbịara dị ka onye mba ọzọ nwere ikike pụrụ iche na nka na afọ 2007.
Ọ bụ onye na-ese ihe na Robert E
Brown Center For World Music na Mahadum Illinois Urbana-Champaign, ebe ọ bụbu onye nkuzi nleta site na afo 2008 ruo na afọ 2011
Ọ bụkwa onye nduzi egwu na onye na-eduzi egwu nke Ballet Waraba na North Carolina, Ballet Wassa-Wassa na Santa Cruz, California, California, na Les Percussion Malinke na mpaghara San Francisco Bay.
